sourcesContent:
<template>
  <el-container>
    <el-aside style="width: 200px;margin-top: 20px">
      <Switch></Switch>
      <SideMenu @indexSelect="listByCategory" ref="sideMenu"></SideMenu>
    </el-aside>
    <el-main>
      <Books class="books-area" ref="booksArea"></Books>
    </el-main>
  </el-container>
</template>

<script>
import { ref } from 'vue'
import Products from './Product.vue'
import axios from "axios";

export default {
  name: 'AppLibrary',
  components: {
    // eslint-disable-next-line vue/no-unused-components
    Products,
  },
  setup() {
    const sideMenuRef = ref(null)
    const booksAreaRef = ref(null)

    const listByCategory = () => {
      const cid = sideMenuRef.value.cid
      const url = 'categories/' + cid + '/books'
      axios.get(url).then((resp) => {
        if (resp && resp.status === 200) {
          booksAreaRef.value.books = resp.data
        }
      })
    }

    return {
      sideMenuRef,
      booksAreaRef,
      listByCategory
    }
  }
}
</script>

<style scoped>
.books-area {
  width: 990px;
  margin-left: auto;
  margin-right: auto;
}
</style>
